unnormalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink and You'll Miss It! (And Maybe Regret It!)
normalised: Flash Sales: Blink and You'll Miss It! And Maybe Regret It!

unnormalised: Hey everyone! Ever been scrolling through Instagram and BAM! A flash sale pops up? Happened to me just yesterday while I was daydreaming about Onam sadhya. It was a saree I'd been eyeing from this boutique in Chandni Chowk, a whopping 50% off for just 3 hours! Talk about pressure.

It was a saree I'd been eyeing from this boutique in Chandni Chowk, a whopping fifty percent off for just three hours! Talk about pressure.

unnormalised: Flash sales are everywhere these days, aren’t they? From Myntra to even smaller online stores, they're the retail equivalent of a Bollywood dance number – high energy, fast-paced, and designed to grab your attention. They’re those limited-time offers that promise massive discounts on, well, practically anything. Electronics, clothing, home decor – you name it, some retailer somewhere is probably running a flash sale on it right now.

unnormalised: But are they worth the hype? Well, that depends. On one hand, you can snag some amazing deals. Remember that leather jacket you’ve been wanting from that shop in Colaba Causeway? A flash sale could make it finally affordable. You could save Rs. 5000 or more!
normalised: But are they worth the hype? Well, that depends. On one hand, you can snag some amazing deals. Remember that leather jacket you’ve been wanting from that shop in Colaba Causeway? A flash sale could make it finally affordable. You could save rupees five thousand or more!

unnormalised: On the other hand, the urgency they create can lead to impulse buys. You see a "70% off!" banner and suddenly you're adding a bunch of stuff to your cart that you don't really need (or even want!). It's like getting a waft of biryani - irresistible, but maybe not the best idea if you’re already full.

unnormalised: So, how do you navigate the flash sale frenzy? First, have a plan. Know what you're looking for and roughly what price you're willing to pay. Second, compare prices elsewhere before you commit. That "discounted" price might still be higher than the regular price somewhere else. Finally, don’t panic! If you miss a sale, chances are another one will be along soon. Remember the saree I missed? I'm betting they'll have another flash sale before Diwali. Stay tuned and shop smart, folks!
